Topic.Title: Hey Mad,I heard You and Temple U had a very happy group of kids there !!!

Message.Msg: No I'm not from that area. (California Kid) Back in 1990 McDonnell Douglas sent me to Dayton to inspect some C-17 tooling and I went to the museum It left a LIFE LONG impression of joy in my heart Haven't seen Crimelord or Madbezos since Yahoo brought out the new boards. Happy to see you're still with us :-)

Topic.Title: Hey Mad,I heard You and Temple U had a very happy group of kids there !!!

Message.Msg: Nice to know you.So my guess is the spuce goose of H.H. is a sight to see ? I know the past 2-3 month's Our Pres brought Air Force One to the area and the flight path was over my house a few time's.GLTY and your's.Have a Great Thanksgiving! "Happy to see you're still with us :-)" Me Too!
You can always call Paypal or Ebay for help if you need to. They are quite good at assisting.
